description: still life with cream and blue tankard at left, folded "Times" newspaper dated 1877 at center, ivory and wood flute with bottom joint removed, pipe leaning on a blue box at right and several burned matchsticks; several areas of highly-raised impasto:  matchsticks in LRC and LLC, highlights on pipe and tankard
marks: Signature and Date LRC, in light brown: [W M (inside H) HARNETT. / 18
title: Still-life with Flute and Times
